meanings.definition: Suspenders worn over the shoulders to hold up trousers.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted his galluses before heading out to work.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of galluses to keep her pants up.
meanings.sent3: The clown's oversized galluses kept slipping comically.
meanings.sent4: Her galluses were like loyal friends, always keeping her pants in place.
meanings.sent5: The old man's galluses were a symbol of his hardworking nature.

meanings.definition: A pair of straps that pass over the shoulders and fasten to the waistband of trousers or a skirt.
meanings.sent1: The galluses on his overalls were sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the galluses on her skirt.
meanings.sent3: The galluses on the dress gave it a unique and vintage look.
meanings.sent4: His galluses were like a bridge connecting his pants and shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The galluses on the outfit added a touch of elegance to her appearance.
